refnamediv.refpurpose: Performs cross-synthesis between two source fsigs.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Performs cross-synthesis between two source fsigs.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: fsig pvscross fsrc, fdest, kamp1, kamp2

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: The operation of this opcode is identical to that of pvcross (q.v.), except in using fsigs rather than analysis files, and the absence of spectral envelope preservation. The amplitudes from fsrc and fdest (using scale factors kamp1 for fsrc and kamp2 for fdest) are applied to the frequencies of fsrc. kamp1 and kamp2 must not exceed the range 0 to 1.
With this opcode, cross-synthesis can be performed on real-time audio input, by using pvsanal to generate fsrc and fdest. These must have the same format.

warning.para: It is unsafe to use the same f-variable for both input and output of pvs opcodes. Using the same one might lead to undefined behavior on some opcodes. Use a different one on the left and right sides of the opcode.
